description: Detects when an individual stops questioning, becomes rigid in belief, or avoids new information due to certainty, fatigue, or emotional overwhelm. Flags the collapse of inquiry.

variables.C(t): Certainty reinforcement (absolute statements, closed logic loops)
variables.R(t): Risk avoidance (fear of being wrong or challenged)

response: When questions stop, truth decays. Even a small 'what if' can reopen the mind. What’s one angle you haven’t explored yet?
